replies.bodyText:
My experience is that this most often occurs when someone is starting a new branch off develop or rebasing their feature branch off a just-updated develop branch. Most developers I've worked with in the field don't want to analyze all the changes they brought in to determine how they should update their app - they just do the "full update" and grab a cup of coffee while that's doing its thing.
In terms of dh-gradle, a relevant change would be anything in DH core, and/or anything in the Java portion of hub central.
